Package index

Main functions

Process fsa files to generate instability metrics

read_fsa()
Read fsa file
add_metadata()
Add Metadata to Fragments List
find_ladders()
Ladder and bp sizing
find_fragments()
Find fragment peaks
find_alleles()
Find Alleles
call_repeats()
Call Repeats for Fragments
assign_index_peaks()
Assign index peaks
calculate_instability_metrics()
Calculate Repeat Instability Metrics

Plotting functions

Explore data through plots

plot_batch_correction_samples()
Plot correction samples
plot_data_channels()
plot_data_channels
plot_fragments()
Plot Peak Data
plot_ladders()
Plot ladder
plot_repeat_correction_model()
Plot Repeat Correction Model
plot_traces()
Plot sample traces

Ladder fixing

Functions for fixing ladders

fix_ladders_interactive()
Fix ladders interactively
fix_ladders_manual()
Fix ladders manually

Helper functions

Useful functions for extracting information samples or modifying lists of objects

extract_alleles()
Extract Modal Peaks
extract_fragments()
Extract All Fragments
extract_ladder_summary()
Extract ladder summary
extract_repeat_correction_summary()
Extract repeat correction summary
extract_trace_table()
Extract traces
remove_fragments()
Remove Samples from List

Generate template

Functions that generate templates

generate_trace_template()
Generate a Quarto file that has the instability pipeline preset

Import data

Import data from non-fsa formats as a peak table or repeat table

peak_table_to_fragments()
Convert Peak Table to Fragments_repeats class
repeat_table_to_repeats()
Convert Repeat Table to Repeats Fragments
